summary: CONSUMER STATED THAT THEY HAVE THE SAME PROBLEM AS RECALL#98V150001 WINDSHIELD WIPER.  DEALER WILL NOT REPAIR BECAUSE VIN# WAS NOT INCLUDED.  *ND  THE WIPERS WERE INTERMITTENT.  THE CRUISE HAD GONE OUT WHEN THE WIPER/WASHER WAS ERRATIC.  THE PROBLEM HAS NOT BEEN REPAIRED DUE TO THE COST.  THE CONSUMER USED RAIN X TO HELP THE WIPERS.  *SCC
